short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark/Night mode for Wikipedia and Wikipedia's sister projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant Dark/Night mode for Wikipedia and it's sister projects such as MediaWiki, Meta-Wiki and Wikidata.
Clicking on the extension to enable dark mode will automatically enable dark mode for all new Wikipedia pages.
